text: Ani tumhi konatyahi sthitita asa ani ya sthitimmadhye tumhi kothunahi kura'ana pathana kara ani tumhi loka je kamadekhila karata amhala sarvancica khabara asate. Jevha tumhi tya kamata vyasta asata ani tumacya palanakartyapasuna tilamatra vastu lapaleli nahi, na dharatita, na akasata ani na ekhadi vastu tyahuna lahana ani na ekhadi mothi, tathapi he sarva khulya- spasta granthata ahe
